line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Creates arrays of search substrings for each race. We'll search the names of ships for these substrings and colour the substring if found.
* We build 2 different arrays for each race. One for ships, one for stations. Try to avoid wasting CPU cycles searching irrelevant substrings for a given object.
* First element of the array is always the colour wrapper. This is \033B%s\033X for Argon ships for example.
* Once built, we assign the array to the global array to be accessed by other renaming scripts. This way we only have to build once per game session.
* - - - Account for the %s in "Pirate Guild%s" string

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Creates arrays of search substrings for each race. We'll search the names of ships for these substrings and colour the substring if found.
We build 2 different arrays for each race. One for ships, one for stations. Try to avoid wasting CPU cycles searching irrelevant substrings for a given object.
First element of the array is always the colour wrapper. This is \033B%s\033X for Argon ships for example.
Once built, we assign the array to the global array to be accessed by other renaming scripts. This way we only have to build once per game session.
- - - Account for the %s in "Pirate Guild%s" string
